message: This is a high-quality product, worth $4000000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. It's a 75% discount, an incredible opportunity!
I'm not going to fall for that obvious scam. I know the product is high-quality, but I'm not paying $1000000 for it. I'll pass.

I'll also offer a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can return the product if it's not as described. The price remains $1000000.
